selection_reasoning: Carrying forward the top-performing Basin Hopping trial (2_1), the mathematically rigorous Nested LP trial (2_8), and the diverse Compression trial (2_5). The next generation will focus on hybridizing the global search of Basin Hopping with the optimal radii calculation of Linear Programming.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest score (2.625). Successfully combined greedy initialization with Basin Hopping. It is the closest to the record and provides the most robust framework for further refinement.

Uses a nested approach with Linear Programming for radii. This is mathematically optimal for radii given fixed centers. Combining this with a global center optimizer (like Basin Hopping) is a high-potential strategy.
Uses a 'Shrinking Boundaries' compression strategy. This unique heuristic reached 2.53 and provides a different path for escaping local optima compared to the standard greedy/SA approaches.
